slides.title: Ancient India - Indus Valley
slides.content:
**Indus Valley Civilization (3300-1300 BCE)**

**Major Sites:**
- Harappa (Pakistan)
- Mohenjo-Daro (Pakistan)
- Lothal (Gujarat)
- Dholavira (Gujarat)
- Kalibangan (Rajasthan)

**Features:** Urban planning, drainage system, Great Bath

slides.title: Vedic Period
slides.content:
**Early Vedic Period (1500-1000 BCE)**
- Rigveda composed
- Pastoral society

**Later Vedic Period (1000-600 BCE)**
- Agricultural economy
- Yajurveda, Samaveda, Atharvaveda
- Caste system developed
- 16 Mahajanapadas formed

slides.title: Mauryan Empire
slides.content:
**Chandragupta Maurya (322-298 BCE)**
- Founded Mauryan Empire
- Defeated Seleucus
- Kautilya's Arthashastra

**Ashoka the Great (268-232 BCE)**
- Kalinga War (261 BCE)
- Embraced Buddhism
- Rock and Pillar Edicts
- Dhamma promotion

slides.title: Medieval India - Delhi Sultanate
slides.content:
**Five Dynasties:**
1. Slave Dynasty (1206-1290)
2. Khilji Dynasty (1290-1320)
3. Tughlaq Dynasty (1320-1414)
4. Sayyid Dynasty (1414-1451)
5. Lodi Dynasty (1451-1526)

**Notable Rulers:** Qutub-ud-din Aibak, Alauddin Khilji, Muhammad bin Tughlaq

slides.title: Mughal Empire
slides.content:
**Major Mughal Emperors:**

**Babur (1526-1530):** First Battle of Panipat (1526)

**Akbar (1556-1605):** Din-i-Ilahi, Nine Gems

**Shah Jahan (1628-1658):** Taj Mahal

**Aurangzeb (1658-1707):** Last great Mughal

slides.title: British India
slides.content:
**Important Events:**

**1857:** First War of Independence

**1885:** Indian National Congress formed

**1905:** Partition of Bengal

**1919:** Jallianwala Bagh massacre

**1942:** Quit India Movement

**1947:** Independence
